snippet.title: Bokube Prototype Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheeWhiteReaper


FREE DEMO:
Try the demo here! 
https://conceptiongames.itch.io/bokube-alpha-demo

KICKSTARTER:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2139542651/bokube?ref=user_menu

GREENLIGHT: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=928460377


THE GAME:
Bokube is a Push Block, light platformer, light action, perspective puzzle game for PC/MAC/LINUX. Every puzzle level introduces a new enemy, trap, or twist on the games core mechanics and keep levels fresh. 

Change your cameras perspective! Rotate the camera around a level to understand how to solve it or find secrets! You can also zoom in the camera on Boku at any time.

Each level is able to have up to four puzzle cubes for the player to find, push or pull, kill enemies, and take to their colored goals! Later worlds introduce new kinds of puzzle cubes that act differently for deeper puzzle solving the farther you get in the game.
